description: List deployments. You can filter the result list by environment, service, or a single service instance.

nested_items.name: deployments
nested_items.description: An array of deployment with summary data.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the deployment.

nested_items.name: completedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the deployment was completed.

nested_items.name: componentName
nested_items.description: The name of the component associated with the deployment.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the deployment was created.

nested_items.name: deploymentStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the deployment.

nested_items.name: environmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the environment associated with the deployment.

nested_items.name: lastAttemptedDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the last attempted deployment.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the deployment was last modified.

nested_items.name: lastSucceededDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the last successful deployment.

nested_items.name: serviceInstanceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service instance associated with the deployment.

nested_items.name: serviceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service associated with the deployment.

nested_items.name: targetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the target of the deployment.

nested_items.name: targetResourceCreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the target resource was created.

nested_items.name: targetResourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type of the deployment target. It can be an environment, service, service instance, or component.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates the location of the next deployment in the array of deployment, after the current requested list of deployment.
